comments:
I got this error when resuming and hitting a breakpoint in rapid succession.  It seems to me that there is a race condition between DefaultExpressionModelProxy.dispose(), which sets fExpression = null.  And the window selection service.  Adding a isDisposed() call before derefrencing getExpression() should do the trick.
